Package com.empirilytics.qatch.core.model

Class Tqi

java.lang.Object
com.empirilytics.qatch.core.model.AbstractWeightedObject
com.empirilytics.qatch.core.model.Tqi
All Implemented Interfaces:
WeightedObject
public class Tqi extends AbstractWeightedObject
This class represents the total quality index of a project. It is used for the evaluation (quality assessment - estimation) of a certain project or a benchmark of projects.

  • Method Details

    • calculateTQI

      public double calculateTQI(@NonNull @NonNull CharacteristicSet characteristics, @NonNull @NonNull Map<Characteristic,Double> charEvals)
      This method calculates the Total Quality Index (TQI), i.e. the total eval (quality score), of the project based on: - The values of "eval" fields of the characteristics of the model - The values of the weights that the model assigns to each characteristic

      ATTENTION: - The order of the Characteristic objects that are placed in the CharacteristicSet of the quality model matters, because the weights are placed in the weights Vector depending on this order! - Do not change the auto-generated order neither in the Quality Model xml file nor elsewhere inside the program.

      Parameters:
      characteristics - The CharacteristicSet object with the eval fields calculated received from the Project object., cannot be null
      charEvals - Map of the charateristic evaluations used in calculating TQI, cannot be null
      Returns:
      The TQI value
